text:
I have a PC with "Windows 2000 Professional" loaded.
I installed Jakarta-Tomcat1.3.x on it and tried to connect to
"http://localhost as well as http://127.0.0.1" from my web browser, but I am 
unable to connect, but when I am connect to Internet using my modem and then I 
try to Connect to "http://localhost as well as http://127.0.0.1" I am able to 
connect to port 80 of localhost.
Please help me as to how do I connect to "http://localhost as well as 
http://127.0.0.1" without always being conected to Internet.
creator: neeraj_jaiman@indiatimes.com

text:
Unfortunately this is not the correct forum for fixing problems with your (or
Windows) DNS. Please check the microsoft knowledge base to see if your problem
has been reported there.
Thanks for using Apache!
creator: thom@planetarytramp.net
